==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/2/20/episode-651-february-18-2022 Episode #651: February 18, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex has decided that NATO is invading "Russian-held areas in Ukraine" in an attempt to lure Russia into a war
*Alex wrongly claims that [https://web.archive.org/web/20111217151026/http://2001.ukrcensus.gov.ua/eng/results/general/nationality/ the Donbas region] is 98% Russian
*Russia's [https://huri.harvard.edu/files/huri/files/idp_report_3_burkhardt_et_al.pdf?m=1642520438 strategy of passportization]
*Artur Pawlowski was [https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/calgary/pawlowski-charges-bail-denied-coutts-protest-blockade-1.6354354 arrested] and [https://calgaryherald.com/news/crime/street-church-minister-to-remain-behind-bars-pending-trial-for-allegedly-inciting-border-blockade has been denied bail]
*4 protesters at Coutts charged with [https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/calgary/coutts-protest-charges-laid-court-appearance-bail-1.6352482 conspiracy to murder RCMP members]
*Bomb threats to a [https://o.canada.com/news/local-news/all-clear-given-after-bomb-threat-at-the-ottawa-hospital hospital in Ottawa], the [https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/windsor/windsor-bomb-threat-arrest-1.6355526 mayor of Windsor], and [https://www.beaconjournal.com/story/news/2022/02/11/akron-area-man-calls-ottawa-ohio-make-bomb-threat-canada/6753322001/ Ottawa, Ohio]
*[https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/ottawa/tamara-lich-bail-hearing-february-19-1.6358307 Tamara Lich], [https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/ottawa/convoy-organizers-charged-bail-1.6357263 Chris Barber], and [https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/ottawa/king-charges-ottawa-police-convoy-1.6358079 Pat King] all arrested and charged
*The police chief in Ottawa [https://www.nytimes.com/live/2022/02/15/world/canada-protests-news Peter Sloly resigned]
*Tow truck companies were [https://www.newsweek.com/canadian-towing-company-ignore-trudeau-order-disrupt-trucker-protests-1679957 not necessarily in support of the protest], but [https://globalnews.ca/news/8625386/canada-convoy-blockades-towing-companies/ seemed to be afraid to aid police] because of the possibility of reprisals from the protesters
*Making accusations of ethnic cleansing of Russians has been a consistent pattern of Putin (and Medvedev) prior to invasions in [https://www.reuters.com/article/idUSLC605039 2008], [https://www.cbc.ca/news/world/vladimir-putin-says-russia-will-not-allow-ethnic-cleansing-in-ukraine-1.2837324 2014], and now it's happening in the present
*In relation to both [https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/jan/21/russia-human-rights-violation-georgia-war-echr-ruling the 2008 war with Georgia] and the [https://www.nytimes.com/2016/05/20/opinion/russia-is-trying-to-wipe-out-crimeas-tatars.html 2014 annexation of Crimea], there are very serious concerns that Russian forces actually were engaging in ethnic cleansing
*Biden said that he was [https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/speeches-remarks/2022/02/18/remarks-by-president-biden-providing-an-update-on-russia-and-ukraine-2/ not going to send troops into Ukraine], but would support Ukraine and impose sanctions
*Chrystia Freeland's grandfather was the editor of [https://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/freeland-knew-her-grandfather-was-editor-of-nazi-newspaper/article34236881/ a publication that printed anti-Semitic content] based in Poland in WWII
*David Icke isn't crying, but he could be
*The [https://howbad.info/index.html How Bad Is My Batch website] is absurd
